name: Red And Blue In The Incinerator
name_original: Red And Blue In The Incinerator
description: You are an incinerator controller in which you must make flames fall, but you must prevent the blue flames from falling to the incinerator, you can stop their fall by destroying them with a blue ray which you must activate and deactivate, You must not be mistaken by eliminating the flame that It's not blue, luck and have fun.
